name: JELLY (EmiePinkBunny)
description:
JELLY is just a simple 2D pixel art endless runner about a jellyfish avoiding plastic. 

I made this approximately in 3 days for a school assignment. I never really programmed anything neither have I done any pixel art, so this was basically a training and learning experience for myself. 

Within these 3 days I learned basics of pixel art creation and 2D Unity environment, so I drew all art assets, made simple animation, programmed all necessary "things" and successfully built everything in Unity. There are still many things I would like to improve some time in the future. Since I'm an absolute beginner, this game wound't be possible with the amazing tutorials by: "Blackthornprod"    https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9Z1XWw1kmnvOOFsj6Bzy2g . 

Music by: Alexander Blu, Sounds by: Juhani Junkala
